about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of a legendary detective in Hollow Bequest, a thrilling hidden object, point&click, narrative adventure filled with mystery and suspense. Explore a world throughout 8 episodes, where every choice matters, and every clue could be the key to unlocking a dark secret.


When a renowned professor vanishes without a trace, you are called back to your university to unravel the mystery. What starts as a simple investigation quickly spirals into a web of intrigue involving a mysterious cult and ominous events threatening the city.
The objectives within the game include uncovering the truth, solving puzzles, and preventing catastrophic events.

Key Features
  • Immersive Storytelling: Experience a captivating tale spread across eight episodes, where your decisions shape the story and lead to multiple endings.
  • Challenging Puzzles: Solve intricate puzzles and uncover hidden objects to piece together the mystery and advance your investigation.
  • Dynamic Choices: Make impactful decisions that alter the course of the narrative, keeping you engaged and on the edge of your seat.
  • Rich Environments: Explore atmospheric locations and interact with a diverse cast of characters, each with their own secrets to uncover.


Co-financed by Croatian Audiovisual Centre.

short_description: As a legendary detective, the disappearance of a former mentor provokes a return to your humble beginnings. Every clue reveals the dark secrets that haunt the town. What should have been a quick investigation gradually became a struggle for your life and freedom. Who or what is responsible?
